Welcome to Exploring Computing. Today's video is Computer

So in this video,

And you'll recall

network security concerns--

authentication, being able to
determine that the person who we're talking to is
who they say they are; integrity, making sure that our
messages aren't tampered with;

a particular action in a way

going to be talking about now

the general umbrella

on encryption techniques.
